code: import{createContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[authenticated,setAuthenticated]=useState(null);const checkAuth=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/exercises",{withCredentials:true});setAuthenticated(true);}catch(error){console.log("erorr found",error);setAuthenticated(false);}};const logout=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/logout",{},{withCredentials:true});setAuthenticated(false);window.location.href="/WorkoutRoutineApp";}catch(error){console.log("Error",error);}};useEffect(()=>{checkAuth();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthContext.Provider,{value:{authenticated,checkAuth,logout},children:children});};
